name: Bone Voyage (itch)
description:
The Ghost Ship sails astray, with not a single person inside.....

or is there? 

Play as the lone survivor in the ghost ship, in Bone Voyage! Hide in 120 seconds before the ghost catches up to you, or be lost to the darkness. Will you survive the night?

Features:

1) Traverse the ghost ship as you try to find somewhere to hide

2) Hide in 120 seconds or be caught

3) Stunning interior to explore
